author: jordan-martins
body:
Hi,

This PR addresses the ongoing effort within JME POG to understand the highPt Jets tail highlighted by the dijet analysis. The idea is to provide two SDs from Muon (Z+jets) and EGamma (Photon+jets) PDs streamed by specific HLT paths. 

In this PR we offer the following:
- PDWG_EGMJME_SD_cff.py: This file filters the HLT path for the EGamma PD
- PDWG_MUOJME_SD_cff.py: This file filters the HLT path for the Muon PD
- Skims_PDWG_cff.py: This is updated with the event content to be requested. We have set up RAW-RECO (not just RAW because we have experienced troubles with RAW as SD within T0; see ReseverDMu example)
- autoSkim.py: This is updated for two purposes: 
1- in the scope of this PR, 2022 has Muon and EGamma, and 2023 has EGamma[0,1] and Muon[0,1]
2- given that a full ReRECO of 2022 and 2023 is on the horizon, 2022 PDs have been allowed (removed the #) so that PdmV can ask for the Skims as a whole for all the PDs.

There will be a backport to 13_3_X and 13_0_X. 

Thanks,
PPD
title: Adding Two Secondary Datasets for JME POG
